about_the_game:
Geared for Fear combines the arena shooter action of car combat games with the chaos and freedom of rigid body simulations. Each vehicle has a distinct set of abilities, for both combat and movement.

Free for All Madness

Twelve rival criminals chase a money truck. Attack the truck, or kill competitors, to take the riches.

13 Unique Vehicles

Choose between monster trucks, a hearse, a limousine, a harvester and more - each with different playstyles.

Metal of Mass Destruction

Enjoy a wide range of weapons from rocket launchers to chainsaws.

Push Forward Combat

Aggession is rewarded, so don't hold back your psychotic urges.
